songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Akon]
When I see you
I run out of words, to say (Ahh)
I wouldn't leave you
’Cause you're that type of girl to make me stay (Ahh)
I see the guys tryin' to holla
Girl, I don’t wanna bother you
'Cause you're independent and you got my attention
Can I be yo' baby father?
Girl, I just wanna show you
That I love what you are doin' now

[Pre-Chorus: Akon]
I see you in the club, you gettin' down, girl
I wanna get with you, yeah
I see you in the club, you showin' thugs love
I wanna get with you

[Chorus: Akon]
You're so beautiful, so damn beautiful
Said you’re so beautiful, so damn beautiful
You’re so beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
You're so beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
You’re so beautiful

[Verse 2: Negra Li]
Nos teus olhos
Eu me encontrei, te encontrei
Como um sonho
Me apaixonei
Me apaixonei
Eu só quero que me ame mais, mais, mais
E não quero que me diga bye bye bye
Eu só quero que me ame mais, mais, mais
E não quero que me diga bye bye bye

[Pre-Chorus: Akon & Negra Li]
I see you in the club, you gettin' down, girl
Eu sei, você me quer
I see you in the club, you showin' thugs love
Eu também quero você

[Chorus: Akon & Negra Li]
You're so beautiful, so damn beautiful
Said you’re so beautiful, so damn beautiful
You're so beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
You're so beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
You're so beautiful

[Verse 3: Akon & Negra Li]
Where'd you come from you're outta this world
To me (Oh oh)
You're a symbol of what a big beautiful woman should be (Ooh wee; oh oh)
Eu só quero que me ame mais, mais, mais
E não quero que me diga bye bye bye
Eu só quero que me ame mais, mais, mais
E não quero que me diga bye bye bye

[Pre-Chorus: Akon & Negra Li]
I see you in the club, you gettin' down, girl
Eu sei, você me quer
I see you in the club, you showin' thugs love
Eu também quero você

[Chorus: Akon & Negra Li]
You're so beautiful, so damn beautiful
Said you're so beautiful, so damn beautiful
You're so beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
You're so beautiful, beautiful, beautiful, beautiful
You're so beautiful
songs.title: Beautiful (Como Um Sonho)
